Displaying and Changing Chart Data

Note: This topic applies to charting in the Windows client only.

After you display a chart, you can use the Data Editor to display the data on which it is based and, if desired, change it.

To display chart data:

  1. Click the Tools button on the Chart window toolbar.

  2. Click Data Editor on the Tools menu. The menu option becomes checked, and the Data Editor appears in the chart area. It displays a matrix that shows the legend entries vertically and the charted values for each of the entries horizontally.

  3. Click the Tools button again and clear Data Editor from the menu. The chart reappears and the values disappear.

To change chart data:

  1. Click the Tools button on the Chart window toolbar.

  2. Click Data Editor on the Tools menu. The menu option becomes checked, and the Data Editor appears in the chart area. It displays a matrix that shows the legend entries vertically and the charted values for each of the entries horizontally.

  3. Double-click any value to access the Edit mode.

  4. Enter the new value.

  5. Using the arrow keys, move from value to value to make the appropriate changes.

  6. Press Enter, or click outside the Data Editor to exit the Edit mode.

  7. Click the Tools button again and clear Data Editor from the menu. The chart reappears, and the values disappear.
